Data Fields

DGtalBoard::Color myPenColor

Detailed Description

Custom style class redefining the pen color. You may use DGtalBoard::Color::None for transparent color.

   DGtalBoard board;
   board << CustomPenColor( DGtalBoard::Color::Green );
   ...
See also:
DGtalBoard
Examples:

dgtalboard-5-greedy-dss.cpp.
